Mod PokeCraft for Minecraft

Mod PokeCraft for Minecraft PE revolutionizes the way you add new features to your Minecraft Pocket Edition game. With its ultra-simple installation process, you can say goodbye to the lengthy mod installation headaches. In just one click and under 10 seconds, enhance your Minecraft universe with exciting new Pok√©mon characters, including fan favorites like Pikachu, Bulbasaur, Charmander, and Squirtle.
